text:
Terimakasih untuk pengalaman yang berkesan,
Suasana Resort sangat tenang, cocok untuk pasangan. Pemilik nya sangat ramah ditambah dengan staff yang selalu siap membantu. Kamar bersih, servis memuaskan. Terimakasih telah banyak membantu di liburan kami.
See you next time marygio...
title: Luar biasa

text: The staff is amazing, the hotel is very nice and the service is great. the ac works amazing, the rooms are comfortable and well cleaned each day. We were there for 3 weeks and we became like family.  Breakfast is nice with a reasonable selection, but yogurt would have been nice. It was an added bonus the hotel had their own generator as power on the island had some interruptions, as can be expected on a small island. We noticed not all hotels did. Great stay
title: Staff is amazing

text:
We recently enjoyed a relaxing stay at this friendly little resort on Gili Trawangan. Special thanks to all the lovely staff, including Yuni, Osman and Sehaman. As well as Indonesian, they speak Italian and English.

There are around 8 rooms located in two double storey buildings adjacent to the pool. Bougainvillea plants with pink and orange flowers climb the blue and white buildings. The pool is a centrepiece. It is 9-10 metres long and perhaps around 4-5 metres wide. Very clean, as is the whole place.

We were in an upstairs room with a balcony. The room and balcony are both spacious. Bathroom and beach towels are supplied. The rooms are airconditioned and the resort has a generator as Gili Trawangan occasionally loses electricity (twice in the week we were there). Plenty of hot water.

Good daily housekeeping.

The balcony contains a clothes rack for drying clothes and also two chairs and a coffee table.  

Breakfast is a la carte from a small menu and was included in the price we paid and so we thought it good value for money.

The call to prayer from the loudspeakers attached to two nearby mosques woke us at about 5am each morning. We were woken up even with ear plugs in! The resort itself is quiet and we otherwise slept well.

The resort is located on a dirt track that is easy to miss from the main beachfront road. But it is actually the main East-West thoroughfare for the island and is on Google maps. We found the track (and indeed the whole island) quite safe. We used our iPhone torches as the track is not well lit at night and we did not wish a bicycle to run into us!  There are at least 3 good places to eat along the track being Tiki Grove (Mexican, fun vibe) and Chockers (airconditioned,  modern) - both 5 minutes walk fromthe resort. Also, Pituq Woerung (vegan food in garden setting, a 10 minute walk). Jali Resort has great food at very reasonable prices and is about 10-15 min walk away.  

It is a 5 minute walk to the beach from Marygio Resort. Turtle Point is nearby (starts near Danima Resort). You can hire snorkeling gear from beach kiosks there.

We paid IDR 100,000 to travel by donkey cart from Margygio Resort back to the public ticket office / boat disembarkation point. It is otherwise about a 15 minute walk.  The resort can arrange bike hire if you wish.

Good value for money resort, and a lovely relaxed safe vibe.
title: Friendly little resort

text:
We (husband and I) stayed here for 2 nights about a week ago and enjoyed our stay. 
The people were very helpful and kind especially Sahman and the location was good. We hired bikes from a lady next door to the hotel and it took roughly 5-10mins to cycle to the main road with bars/clubs/restaurants. 
If you want to party however I’d recommend staying closer to the main strip.
title: Nice short stay

text: Had an amazing two night stay at Marygio in December 2018. Hotel was just what we needed - clean and tidy, lovely pool and close to everything on Gili T. The staff were so helpful and friendly. Thank you so much :)
title: Little gem on Gili T

text: We stayed here for three nights and it was great, such a lucky find! Just away from the main road, so lovely and quiet but also so close to the beach and restaurants! The staff here couldn’t be faulted, especially Sahman who was always ready to help us with anything (restaurant recommendations, the best place to find turtles etc.) with a smile on his face! The breakfast was great, and made to order so really fresh and tasty! All in all such a great stay and Gili itself is looking beautiful and recovering well, really worth a visit if you’re in Bali!
title: The loveliest boutique hotel with the most attentive staff

text: This hotel is a beautiful small quiet boutique hotel. It’s a 5 minute walk to the beach so not to close and not too far. The staff are super friendly too also free bikes to use for hotel guests thanks for a great stay
title: Thanks for a relaxing stay.

text: I cannot say enough good things about this little hotel. The rooms are clean, made up twice a day (morning cleaning & evening turndown). The best part is the team of staff who are incredibly friendly and attentive to your every need.  At one point we we wanted to make sandwiches but could not find mayo so one of the guys took off on his bike and within a few minutes returned with mayo in hand! Breakfast was fresh and delicious (made to order & not buffet). You cannot beat the price either! Highly recommend staying here.
title: Incredible Find - Incredible Staff

text:
Had a 5 night stay which is amazing. Very quiet place with easy access to the beach.

Staff was really friendly and helpful. The breakfast is amazing which we have not missed just one.

Bike rentals 20m away and you can totally relax around the pool. So nice and would recommend to everyone.
title: Totally enjoyed it!

text: Had a great stay here. It was located perfectly in the middle of everywhere with easy routes to all the best parts of the island but away from the noisier/busier beach areas. (We rented a bike and it look 10 minutes to each end of the island) Lovely staff and owners, so very helpful and attentive. The room was beautifully clean and tended to twice a day. Breakfast was lovely especially with the added bonus of the cakes of the day.. everyday..!
title: Lovely stay

text:
Me and my fiancee stayed at Marygio's for 4 nights and just had such a lovely time there. We were welcomed with a drink and check in was swift and staff were very welcoming and informative.
The resort itself is set back from the beach and main strip, only a few minute walk, and is classic italian style buildings which look great, the pool is a great size and theres lots of grass, bushes and flowers all well maintained on the grounds.
The owner and his daughter were always knocking around, always saying hello, talking with us, and we felt very well looked after for our entire stay. We even had freshly made bruschetta delivered to our room in the evenings which tasted delicious and was a very nice touch. The breakfast was excellent, home-made cakes were so tasty and the breakfast menu was very good, staff were very helpful and delivered a great service.
The room was fantastic, very spacious, good AC and WiFi, hot water in the shower, a safe, a fridge (which was great for keeping a few beers cold!) and a balcony view over the pool was great. The room also had other commodities such as umbrellas and shower gel and shampoo.
We had an amazing time relaxing by the pool some days, pool towels or beach towels are provided and you can purchase drinks from a small selection at reception.
Was always nice coming back to your room after a long day to find your bed made and waiting for you, the entire place was exceptionally clean, and we loved coming back to be greeted by the owner and his daughter (and the rest of the staff) and having a chat about our day or our plans for the rest of the trip.
Would certainly recommend Marygio's and would love to come back again in the future! Genuinely left feeling like part of the family we just had a really brilliant stay there.
Thanks once again, 
Nick & Evie, UK
title: Came as a guest, left feeling part of the family

text:
My husband and I went here with our daughter and son in law
I can not rate this place highly enough
Staff were friendly and helpful throughout
This place is an amazing little find and we all really enjoyed our stay. Thank you all so much
title: Amazing place

text: Me and my wife stayed here for 5 nights, the place was beautiful and so peaceful! The staff are really friendly and will help you with anything that you may need. The breakfast they serve is also amazing, id recommend the pancake with banana and caramel!! If your visiting Gili T, i'd recommend you stay here, you won't be disappointed.
title: Highly recommend!!

text:
The Marygio is nothing but amazing. We stayed there for two nights and everything was spot on. From the wonderful breakfast to the cleanliness and location. 
What stands out the most is the service. Don Adriano is the nicest person ever and is always there making sure your needs are taken care of. He is on top of his staff and knows what true service is all about. Attention to detail and care about the guests. 
Him and family will greet you upon check in, breakfast and will help you with all requests. 

Living in Indonesia and knowing the standards this place blew me away. Only place where I will stay in Gili T.
title: Amazing. Best Hotel in Gili T.

text:
This well run family business takes care of your every need and the staff are extremely friendly and honest.The breakfast is like singing hymns and clapping hands,absolutely delicious.

The bond between father and daughter is truly beautiful to watch and makes the entire experience holistic and warm.I am from a big Portuguese family and I can relate to a close knitted family environment .

I would recommend this establishment to family and friends.

Thank you to Alessandra and Giorgio for your hospitality,
title: Wonderful experience

text: We stayed in the Marygio Resort on Gili T for three nights. The staff were helpful and friendly and it is in a very central location, very close to the beach. There is a 24 hour reception which is very secure. We were given free breakfast which was a nice touch. Our room was quite spacious, however the shower had extremely low power and it was a struggle to even get sand off your feet, not to mention wash your hair properly. We found it strange that the cleaning staff would enter our room multiple times throughout the day, not just in the morning. We would return from the beach in the evening or back from dinner at night and they would have cleaned again and moved our suitcases etc. I'm sure that the staff thought that they were being helpful, but we found it to be a slight invasion of privacy. Once a day is plenty. The mosque is very close by, and calls to prayer, through loudspeaker, began at 5am every morning. It is unbelievably loud and continues for over ten minutes. I would recommend staying somewhere slightly out of the centre to avoid being woken so early every morning, as it was impossible to have a relaxing nights sleep.
title: Pleasant

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, first of all, I want to thank you for having spent your time for writing this review and for the beautiful words about our staff and your room but I would like to point out 3 things: 
the main cleaning is done in the morning, in the evening is given a quick fix and we spray the disinfectant, anyway if you bothered about this you could tell us, there would be no problem.
Shower pressure is probably not the same as we can find in the big city as in Europe (we are on an 8km island in the middle of the ocean). 
The last thing I would like to point out is that we are far away from the mosque, but sometimes when the wind pulls in our direction the sound can get stronger, unfortunately we are in a small Muslim island and it is inevitable.

Best Regards
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The Marygio is a very quaint, boutique hotel. The rooms are immaculate and the grounds and swimming pool are extremely well looked after. The owners and the staff are very friendly and it has a wonderful atmosphere. It is under 5 mins to walk down to the beach and only a minute if you are on a bicycle. There is a little shop just across from the hotel which will rent you a bike. 
They spoil you at breakfast with delicious pastries as a little surprise so watch your waistline. Thank you to everyone at Marygio, it was a great holiday. I highly recommend this hotel. (Hugs from Debbie)
title: Wonderful stay

text: We were staying down the road from Marygio Resort for our first two nights. We decided to stay an extra two nights on Gilli T and were so excited to find this quiet, well kept, and clean oasis for the last part of our trip. The staff were so helpful and friendly. The owners were available most of the day to answer any questions. The staff were constantly asking if we needed anything. Can't say enough about their welcoming attitudes. The owners are Italian ( and the Italian preference for QUALITY is very apparent). Our room was crispy and clean. The pool and garden area are well kept. And breakfast was amazing. The bruschetta and omelette were my favorite.
title: Perfect location in Gilli T away from the Party Scene but still close to everything you need

photos.caption: Lovely pool, yummy breakfast, and sarong which they provide you for the beach each day.
Lovely pool, yummy breakfast, and sarong which they provide you for the beach each day.
Lovely pool, yummy breakfast, and sarong which they provide you for the beach each day.
Lovely pool, yummy breakfast, and sarong which they provide you for the beach each day.

text: This hotel is very nice and with lovely staff. Super clean rooms with comfortable beds. And most important, it's quiet. Good escape from all the partying on Gili T :) The breakfast was also very nice. Nothing to complain about. I would definitely stay again :)
title: Very nice & quiet hotel with lovely staff

text:
The Marygio is a small hotel with very nice and clean rooms. There's a selection of breakfast dishes from which you can choose of. The rooms are comfortable and they clean them everyday.

Beachtowels and pooltowels are provided, and you can reach the beach in 5 minutes. We really recommend this hotel, although it is a little bit expensive, compared to the other possibilities for a stay.

The owners are lovely people from italia, they help you wherever they can and are really friendly 😄
title: Beautiful and quiet hotel on Gili T

text: I arrived on Gili T with no where to stay as my plans had changed last minute. Arriving post Rinjani I wanted a bit of comfort and a decent shower! I felt that I got this here. The room was a decent size and the shower was not bad - I would say the water wasn't really hot but in a hot climate that is fine. It was nice to have a pool. Breakfast was good. Location is just a little out from the craziness of the main strip but it doesn't take long to walk there. Close to the beach. For a couple of days of doing nothing this hotel was fine.
title: Nice staff

text: We had bad wetter but never the les de hotel give us a feeling that the sun was shining, and the the owner and staff were real polite and helpful, so never the les we had bet wether but a nice hotel witch I can recommended every one 😌
title: Awesome

text:
This respite is really nice. The staff is more than welcome and really helpful. 
The rooms are very clean and they pay attention to details to assure that the customers feels like being home. 
The breakfast is incredible: you can chose between eight different dishes or just take them all.

I can really recommend this resort as you get more than what you could expect :)
title: All you need and more than expected

text:
We stayed here for 5 days in February 2017 during the low season in Bali. The hotel is a little bit outside the center of the island (in a very small island), but its still very close to the beach and restaurants. The fact that we could avoid all the noise and people was actually very good. The hotel has great staff, they where very friendly and helped us with everything not just the regular stuff that you expect they also helped us with other things like where we could see a football game 4 a clock in the night. The owners are very kind and helpful. They recommended us a couple of restaurants that where very good and they where generally very nice to talk to telling us information about what to do what to avoid etc. The service in the hotel was top class, the rooms where very clean and i liked the bathroom a lot because of its functionality. They cleaned the rooms at least 2 times a day but sometimes even more. Every time we left the room and came back it was cleaned with new fresh towels and clean floor. The hotel is not a large complex instead you have a cos hotels with your own corner in the garden. Every room has a little entrance and this increases the feeling of staying in a place of your own instead of sharing a complex with ten of others. The hotel breakfast was very good and you had plenty to choose from. They had 2 different egg dishes pancakes, fried banana and some more that i don t really remember. They also had a new cake everyday which was my favorite.

The Italian owners are very kind and helpful combined with the friendly Indonesian stuff in the hotel the stay in Hotel Marygio overall was very pleasant.
title: Excellent hotel in lovely Gili T

text:
The location was absolutely peaceful and close to the the main street (only 2 minute by walk from the beach..the best spot).
 Alessandra was such a lovely host, she answered all our questions about gave us a detailed map where to go around the island for snorkeling, drinks and the best restaurants. Breakfast was served every morning on the balcony in front of the pool. It was delicious, generous and homemade (italian bruschetta was amazing!!!). The room was very nice and equipped with everything. Perfect and impeccable cleanliness.
I will definitely recommend this!!!
Thank you Marygio....you are adorable!!!
title: Lovely accomodation!

text: This is a gorgeous, quiet hotel. I think about 8 rooms around a lovely pool.  Clean, modern and a great location.  Close to the best snorkelling spots on Gili T.  Breakfast was generous and well presented.  This is a good place to base yourself on the island.  The staff were also great here.
title: Beautiful

text: We checked in at the Marygio. The location was not really good, some back streets where we had to walk through the water to come to the resort. Room was clean but not very comfy. Bathroom very uncomfortable - no place to put shampoo or soap etc and then the water pressure was very very low - so we were very disappointed as it was very different then the information we read on this. Breakfast ok but very simple again / not even nasi goreng.....will never come back n no value for the money
title: Why is place so special??

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Is Marygio perhaps a special place because It was liked by 196 other people? 
I would like to clarify a few things compered to what you wrote: our hotel is locate 80 mt from the beach (The main street). Unfortunately you come during the monsoon and in the 2 day that you came here It rained a lot and the whole island  was flooded  (perhaps our street it was a bit less because we are raised respect to the rest of the island).
The bathroom is equipped with a shelves around and under the sink where you can place everything.
About the water pressure that you didn't like, I want remaind you that we are in a small island in the middle of the ocean.

Regards!
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed here for 3 nights for new Year. To say we were blown away is an understatement. upon arriving the staff and owners were so attentive and friendly a great welcoming. The bedrooms were great with a balcony overlooking the pool and incredible plants and garden surrounds. Breakfast was served on a balcony type terrace which as lovely, however the breakfast was something else.... The most delicious homemade al carte menu. Everything homemade in the Italiano way which is where the owners originated from. On New years day we were welcomed by hugs and wishes of a prosperous 2017 and a homemade panettone for good luck... Literally something that bought a tear to my eye. They have everything covered from towels by the pool to sarongs for you to sit on the beach it was our friends birthday and mentioned it to them and when we arrived back from the beach were greeted with a song of happy birthday and the most delicious homemade chocolate cake i have ever tasted!!. Unfortunately the day we were leaving a storm had happened with most of the streets water logged and the horse and cart office ringing off the hook, in order for us to not miss our boat the owners and the staff carried out luggage through the street to the beach to ensure they were not wet or dragged through puddle. The most incredible hosts and also a fantastic family who go above and beyond to ensure you have the most amazing and special stay.
title: a delightful family run Hotel, could not ask for more!!

text: Great hotel, great staff and nice swimming pool. The hotel has a great localization, it´s near good restaurantes, but in a quiet place. The room was clean, the breakfast was just wonderful.  We just felt home there and I highly recommend this hotel.
title: Wonderful

text: Stayed here for three nights and were so impressed! The hosts were so helpful! It's located in a great location and close to the main Strip! Rooms were cleaned whenever you left and were super comfy! Also the breakfast was amazing, made us delicious ice coffee every morning :)!
title: Marygio

text:
We stayed here for 3 nights and were made to feel so welcome throughout the entire stay. The hotel is about a 15 minute walk / 5 minute cycle from the main hub of restaurants and nightlife which is perfect as it was so quiet at night and were not disturbed at all. It is also on the main track that crosses the island so the sunset beach is only a 20 minute walk / 10 minute cycle away.

The rooms are spacious and clean all with balconies over looking the secluded pool. The staff are so friendly and will go out of their way to make your stay perfect. On our last day we missed breakfast as we needed to get our boat and the owner gave us some breakfast to take for our journey. She also got us a great price when we rented bikes for the day. 

Would definitely recommend staying here - be close enough to the island hub but far enough away for peace and quiet!
title: Lovely family run hotel in a great location

text: For an island like Gili T, this resort is great for couples looking to get away from the main strip. The owners and staff were incredible and were nothing short of helpful. From the incredible breakfasts to the tips about the island, we were very pleased with our stay. Would definitely stay here again.
title: Fantastic

text:
I'm not really one to write a review but I thought it necessary for this place. The owners are so amazing, extremely hospitable and welcoming. They couldn't do enough for us whilst we were there and I can't thank them enough! The hotel is kept very clean and tidy and they deliver a great breakfast! It's not on the strip so it's much quieter which we preferred! The pool area is nice and there are some great songs playing throughout the day. The owners are full of knowledge so recommended some great restaurants. We were staying in room 4 with a view of the pool. Thank you so much for being so lovely! All the best to you and the business 

Catherine and Kyle
title: Fantastic place, great owners!

text: We were welcomed with juice and home made cake (yum!). Room was spacious, clean, bright. Large wardrobe, safe, fridge, t&c making facilities and tv. Pool was serene with comfy loungers. Breakfast was amazing; fresh fruit, fresh bread & choice of eggs. Plus fruit smoothie & hot drinks - sets you up for the day. Location is good as it's a little away from the main drag, so you can sleep in peace. The main swimming beach is only a few minutes walk away. But as mentioned in previous reviews, it is the staff that make this property stand out; Antonio and his daughter, plus all of the hotel staff were wonderful; welcoming you like family. No question was a bother, they assisted with multiple tour/restaurant suggestions and were so friendly. They were very accommodating on check out day, with luggage storage, use of the pool & towels. I would stay here again for sure.
title: Wonderful friendly, relaxed, family run boutique hotel

text: This hotel is a little bit of magic hidden on Gili T. A lot of that comes down to how it's run. The staff training must have been like a military operation because it's the best service I've had in Indonesia. The manager also is extremely friendly and accommodating. He also plays the role of the suave Italian very well in his white linen, cigarette in hand. What a lovely man. The music round the pool also makes a welcome break from the booming bass lines you hear all over gili t. The breakfast is top quality. You will definitely won't be left hungry. All in all well worth the price.
title: An absolute gem

text:
So I've read some of the recent reviews of this resort and was pretty shocked to see someone moaning that the resort was too noisy! This is utter rubbish. I stayed at Marygio for 5 nights and not once was I woken up by birds or the mosque. Granted the mosque can certainly be heard but there are about 3 mosques on this little island and you can pretty much hear one of them wherever you are, I think that's the point! So to cut a long story short, loss of sleep is certainly not something you will experience here. I would say I am a fairly light sleeper but not once was I awoken before my alarm. 

Moving on I just wanted to say how truly fabulous Marygio is, not only is it super close to everything (the main beach as well as the other sunset side) but all the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful which is a real blessing! Free drinks on arrival, constant help with tours and booking return boats, no complaints when I (constantly) swapped my beach towel for a pool towel. Above all it was just nice to chat to the owners who speak wonderful English (as well as many other languages) and make sure you enjoy your stay as much as possible.

Other obvious bonus is the flipping lovely pool which I spent many an afternoon in as well as the breakfast which is scrummy and all fresh!

Basically I loved staying here and had a fantastic break. If anything I would say this is the best place I stayed in my 2 weeks traveling Bali and was well worth the price. 

Thank you Marygio!! Hopefully I will be back one day soon :)
title: Best resort ever!

text: We stayed at the Marygio for 4 nights. Comfortable rooms, which are cleaned twice (!) a day. Italian owners are so friendly and helpfull. Breakfast was, although a la carte, and the same everyday, very good, with Italian Coffee ! Airconditioning works great, which made us needing more to cover up during the night than only a thin sheet. Located at 5-10 from the beach (trip Back to the hotel from the mainstreet is dark through narrow streets). Wi-Fi could have been better, signal in-room was so-so, outside the room much better (and you have to login time and time again). Swimming pool Area is very quiet and relaxing. We absolutely liked our stay here !
title: Very clean, superfriendly owners, great breakfast !

text:
Marygio Resort is located about 5-10 minutes walk from the harbour and set back from the busy main strip. 
Our first impressions of the location were quite good. Granted one must walk down a short dark street full of pot holes but it's preferable to being on the front of the very busy street like some other places. Unfortunately the location suffers two main problems - it's very close to the mosque (or at least the speaker from the mosque) and there are a number of roosters in the immediate vicinity. Naturally one can not blame the hotel for either of these things and yet they both had a significant impact on the enjoyment of the stay. Every day at just before 5am the call to prayer begins and, whilst only lasting 5-10 minutes, is so loud it will wake you from your sleep. If that weren't bad enough the roosters also get in on the act at the same time with their incessant "cock-a-doodle-bloody-do", and you're left to endure a cacophony of noise when you should be fast asleep. As a honeymooning couple we found this unbearable.
The rooms themselves are basic, tidy, have a safe (ours was broken so needed to use the key), cleaned every day including evening turndown, but suffer low pressure showers and no ceilings on the toilets, are very dark due to their aspect, and have large gaps around the doors that makes you wonder about privacy. The power regularly cuts out on a morning too.
Breakfasts are basic but good enough, with a choice of pancakes, omelettes, fruit, toast, tea/coffee and fruit juice.
One thing we really didn't like was that, when one leaves the property to explore the island, the room key must be left at reception. This is - apparently - for security, so they know when to close the main gates on a night. However, we were concerned that we were leaving the keys in an insecure manner (in a basket) in full view of everyone. Indeed on one occasion when we returned to the resort there was nobody around and there would have been nothing stopping us taking the keys to another apartment. That said we went with it and didn't raise our concerns - perhaps the owner could have accommodated another solution had we asked.
We had planned on staying longer on Gili T but there is nothing much worth staying for in the first place unless you dive (we don't) and given the points above decided not to extend our stay at Marygio.
title: Too noisey

owner_response.text:
Dear customer, we are aware of not being able to please all of our customers. But I want to point out two things: the mosque is actually far, but we are on a small Muslim island and it is possible that you could hear if the wind blows in our direction. Second of all, I apologize for the mix up of the safe, but the previous customer crushed repeatedly airing out phase the number system unintentionally. The safe was still useable with the key.
As for our staff, it is 24/24, probably when you came back, he was not sitting in reception because it was around the garden to control.
Yours sincerely,
Marygio Resort
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This cute little resort is just 10minutes walk from the busy area of GiliT. The Italian family who runs and own this place is very friendly and helpful. The staff? I give them 10/10 for sincere friendliness.

The room is simple but super clean (the clean it at least 2x per day). The breakfast is also simple but fresh and the bread is home made.

We highly recommend this to all travelers to stay here in Marygio. The staff and the owners will surely take care of all your needs.

Casper and Gerald from the Netherlands.
title: Clean, quiet and cute resort

text: This was our second stay at Marygio. We stayed long term for 35 days and felt like we were at home. The place is very comfortable and the staff and owners are amazing. Their attention to detail and commitment to ensuring your comfort and enjoyment was very evident and very much appreciated . Everything was perfect... rooms cleaned twice a day, really nice breakfast, need something just ask and sorted with a smile, good location, quiet, perfect. Very good Wifi and the pool is really nice and clean...We left as friends and cannot speak more highly of this property.  Thankyou!!
title: Awesome Holiday Home
Great memories :).

text: Quiet, cozy and comfortable hotel. Great location. Very tasty breakfast. The bed and pillows are top notch, I slept better than in my own home. Room very tidy and clean. Staff - always friendly, cheerful and communicative. Most grateful to the lady of the house! I recommend this hotel to even the most demanding people.
title: Thank you

text:
We stayed here 4 nights and the first impression of Gili Trawagan was not very positive, because of dirty roads and beaches and very overcrowded harbour area.

But when you get in Marygio resort you feel there is a type of quiet heaven just a few hundred meter away from "the boulevard". VERY helpful owners, very good information on restaurants and other issues. Nice pool and very good breakfast.

Thanks again and hope to see you again!!!
title: If you go to Trawagan and close to the harbour, but quiet and peace

text:
The location was brilliant. The resort is just a short walk off the main road - took us no more than 5 minutes and was just far enough that the sounds of late-night partygoers were not a problem :). The actual resort is beautiful as well as the rooms - a reflection of Italian style ;). Free wifi was readily available throughout the property and the connection was really strong. The breakfast was consistently delicious! The staff were all friendly and helpful. While we are a young couple, other travelers at Marygio were a bit older but safe to say Marygio caters for all travelers depending on what you're looking for. Additionally, Marygio offers free use of the loungers and umbrellas of their sister hotel, Danima, which is located right on the beach and a short walk from Marygio. Guests can also order from the restaurant and bar at Danima and their are plenty shops, restaurants and snorkelling stalls along the way. It is easy to see why this resort has a certificate of excellence. All expectations were exceeded! I would stay here time and time again :)

My only suggestion is a stronger aircon. However, we never complained and it may have been a simple matter to sort out - definitely not a deal breaker by any means.
title: Marygio resort - an all round winner! :)

text:
It was a great stay at Maryigio resort. The resort is located next to main road of Gili Trawanga. Adriano and his daughter are very kind...they make you fell like at home. All the staff are very smart and always ready for your requests. They can give you some information about restaurant, snorkeling zone, where rent a bike and can help you about reservation for the boats. The breakfast is very delicious. All the things served are express prepare. No buffet which means best quality. 
Good job Adriano and your family. 

So, enjoy your stay in Marygio Resort.
title: Great place...

text: Suites were quite good, one of the few places with actual hot water. Swimming pool is good enough, the beach at walking distance and the breakfast more than good! Staff is more than helpfull and will do anything to make your stay more comfortable. Thanks a lot !! If i am ever going back to Gili, Marygio will be the first place i'll check in. I've been to Gili before and had multiple other hotels but especially for Marygio i've made this account to show my appreciation. Thank a lot ! you made our stay extra special.
title: recommendation !

text:
This place is amazing! Nice colors, good swimming-pool, a pleasant dining-area. 
Very conveniently located: 5 min walk from the Main street with all bars and restaurants and the beach and also it's like 7 min by bike to another side of the island where all the sunset places are. What was important for me the hotel itself is located in a quiet area.
My room was spacy and beautifully decorated, with everything one may need.
The breakfast was tasty and i loved yummy fresh juices!! 
Big thanks to Adriano and Alessandra for your hospitality and help with everything!! :)
title: Perfect quiet place to stay on Gili!

text:
Cleanliness is the strong point of this little hotel and that is why I chose it...I told the owner that I had a phobia of cockroaches so they put some tabs in the bathroom to keep away insects and that is very appreciable. Quiet peaceful and charming place, very near the beach and the center. Breakfast simple but nice. Owners are Italian so very charming..
A little bit expensive though, compared to the local standard.
But in general I would recommend the place.
title: Marygio resort

text: What a special place to spend a few days! So welcoming and comfortable, we really felt at home. 10/10. Breakfast was great too. We'll worth a visit. Can't do 200 characters but i must be close this is annoying
title: Fabulous

text: Had a relaxing 3 nights here in serene setting. Pool was great and quiet which was a bonus as some friends had lots of kids jumping by about in their pool. The owner was very welcoming and when we missed our boat on our final day the receptionist rang her brother to take us across to gili air - so lovely.
title: Perfect couples hotel

text:
The perfect break. I had 13 days of complete relaxation. 
The staff and management were always friendly and helpful. 
This boutique hotel is ideally located away from the main street but only 10 minutes walk away from the many bars and restaurants on the island. Also only a few minutes away from the beach where you can just walk into the sea and snorkel over the reef where turtles are a common sight.
The room was perfect with plenty of space and cleaned twice a day.
I have no hesitation in recommending the Marygio Resort.
title: Superb!

text: Lovely hotel with so kind hosts , who are ready to make the most comfortable stay. Incredibly delicious breakfast with homemade bread and fresh pastries, fresh juice ... mmm yam-yam!!! We just married and it was our honeymoon. Staff of the hotel prepared nice room for us with enjoyable surprise. They met us with welcome drinks and a tasty cake! Our bed was decorated with fresh flowers  It was very pleasant for us! location is amazing - 2 minutes and you are on the perfect beach. Sole minus is muslim mosque nearby.  The call to morning prayer is heard loudly throughout the area very early in the morning. But it didn't spoil our holiday/ For the rest - it is the best tropical hotel!! Thank you for everything!
title: It's a para-para-paradiiiiise))

text: This little hidden gem was a great find. The owner, Alessandra and the staff could not do enough for us. The cleanliness of the Marygio was superior, all rooms are cleaned twice a day. The breakfast was plentiful .It is in a good location set back from the main street but only a few minute walk to the beach and restaurants.
title: Great little resort

text: We've stayed 5 nights and loved every second of it. The rooms are spacious, beautiful en very clean. The staff cleaned 2 times a day en did everything to please you. They serve an amazing breakfast with homemade bread, juice and cake. It's centrally located but far away from the busy street..highly recommend this hotel!
title: Little Italian paradise.....

text: This small b&b is centrally located a five minute walk to the beach and main street area.  Alessandra and Adrian made us most welcome whilst not being overly intrusive.  The property is very clean and the pool is refreshing.  Breakfast is very generous and the banana pancake is excellent.  The general ambience sets the tone for a relaxing stay rather than the party atmosphere of many other establishments.  It offers a quiet oasis for more mature couples.
title: Clean and hospitable

text: Our stay at Marygio was just perfect! The tenants, Alessandra and Adriano, are very nice and very helpful (they gave us good advises as regard restaurants), the breakfast was amazing, the room very clean and the place very charming. The hotel is situated not to far from the main street but far enough to be a bit more quiet! Bref, we had a wonderful time there!
title: Perfect stay at Gili's

text: A perfect place for mature couples. We had a fabulous 6 days here in April 2015. My Son and his Fiancée spent the first 3 days here with us and all agreed that it was a wonderful find. A quiet little place, off the beaten track, perfectly maintained. The couple who own/run it are lovely. The staff are approachable and helpful. The breakfast is out of this world. A ton of food, great quality, all fresh, and included in the price of the room. You would pay a fair amount to get a breakfast that good anywhere on the island.
title: Stunning surroundings. Lovely people.

text:
We spent four unforgettable days in this intimate resort and we could not do better choice.
Marygio is a new bed and breakfast consists of only 8 rooms perfectly decorated and super clean, not directly on the beach but it is only 5 minute walk.
The kindness and hospitality of Alessandra and Adrian will make your holiday unforgettable
title: A perfect holiday

text: It is a very peaceful oasis on Gili T. The owners and staff are very pleasant and helpful as they work so hard each day to make your experience restful, comfortable, and enjoyable. The property is spotless, breakfast is plentiful, fresh, and served in such a professional and serene setting. We rented bikes next door, toured the Island every day and came back home to peace and quiet. 10-15 minute walk from main centre or 3 minute bike ride at night to dinner. The pool is wonderful for resting with the jets or pool running at your leisure. We will return to Marygio... hands down.
title: A Perfect Place for Mature Couples

text:
My husband and i stayed at marygio for three nights, while the remaining 14 family members stayed at both villa nero and villa amarik. Our booking was last minute.
When we arrived wewere greeted by the owners a lovely italain couple, i was unwell from the speed boat and was given a ginger tea... a nice touch, very personal. My husband received tropic juice he enjoyed. We arrived early and still within 15minutes the owners arranged for our room to be ready.
The room is indeed small,quaint and minimalistic but no less magical. The bed is comfortable and when lying down you look out sliding doors. I appreciated that thesewere tinted, allowing us to comfortably lie in bed and look outside.
the room is kept immaculately clean. Everytime we left and would come back our bed would be made room sprayed etc.. everytime.
The breakfast is in my opinion the best on the island. Choice of omlette with homemade fresh bread or homemade pancake (banana pancake is awesome) homemade cake (changes daytoday and is also wonderful) fruit platter and toast. I would jump at the chance toeat their again.
the lombok coffee.... not so good but their ar nescafe satchets if you prefer.

the only negative was that the shower is not at all strong and made it difficult to rinse shampoo out of my hair.

Please consider:

-there is no tv
- this hotel is 80m from the beach/mainstrip downa small alley (please bring torch for late night walk) this was not a prolem, just worth considering.

The island has a large mosque which plays at regular intervals...please bring earplugs to ensure a good nights sleep.

p.s all our family wished they were at this gorgeous boutique rather then their hotels. This place made our stay not only memorable but worthwhile i can not recommend it enough !
title: a pleasant suprise

text: love this place accept the air con as other reviewers mentioned. staff polite & helpful, rooms & public facilities are clean, large room, fresh water. breakfast taste ok - need daily variety. a bit dark at night in the alley better bring flash light.
title: small, charming, peaceful

text: Friendly owner - half of success , second half- service, place spotless , cleaned 2-3 time a day! Good quality of breakfast, little quiet oaza , spacious rooms, comfy beds- definitely recommend! Molto grazie for having us;-)
title: Perfect! Amazing service

text:
We found this hotel from Booking.com and immediately booked it after reading the reviews. It certainly didn't disappoint us. We were welcome by one of the staffs, and Alessandra (the owner) came by to welcome us 2 mins later with her daughter, Georgia. The Italian family was very nice and made us feel very comfortable after our little chat, and we were escorted to our room which happened to be the middle room facing the pool! 

The room was was small and cozy, with thoughtful supplies and decorations (orchids on the bed, hairdryer etc). The first thing we noticed was that the shower head was broken, and it got fixed immediately in under 5 mins. Overall, we love this place. It's peaceful on the north side, but not too far away from the central attractions. We would recommend taking the pony ride once you arrived at the harbor, since walking there would be a bit far with luggage. Cycling would be best for your daily transportation, which you could bargain to get under IDR 50k if you rented for a few days straight. 

If you're a party animal and would like to stay on the busy side of the island, this is not the place for you. But if you'd like a nice retreat with excellent service by the owner, and don't mind travelling for 5 mins by cycling to the busiest parts, then I  would highly recommend this place. It's not exactly a backpackers' place to stay (not exactly the cheapest among the lots), or a high end resort, but fit nicely in the middle of those 2 categories. My priority is service, and I'm satisfied. And oh, the breakfast is delicious!
title: Quiet little retreat with excellent service.

text: We loved Marygio, the staff were lovely and our room was great. It was a large room with a hot water shower and air conditioning. The pool was clean and relaxing to sit around. Breakfast was super yummy and there was lots of it wih plenty of fresh fruit. Its a little off the main road but perfect for us. Would advise ear plugs for a peaceful nights sleep as there is a mosque nearby, but this will be the case for all accommodation on this island
title: Lovely peaceful retreat

text:
I stayed here for 3 days 2 nights with my friend, when we arrived, the owner welcomed us personally, and guide us to our room.
the service was very good, the owner was very friendly so does all the workers
the room it self was ok for me, it has an air cond, and the bath room was clean, the shower function very well, they have safe in the room, they clean the room two times in a day.
The bad thing was only the wifi, but maybe because our room was in the end of the resort. I had to go out from the room to get the wifi signal.
The breakfast was excellent,the variant was not that much but it was good for us.
Location wise was ok,its quite far from the central (5-7 min by bicycle) but for me was good so I got a good quality of rest
title: Value of money

text:
The hotel is far enough from the main strip to not be interrupted but still only a three minute walk to the beach. The location is perfect. The hotel only has 8 rooms so makes it really nice, the owners really do make time for you and that's what makes it such a special place. They care about you! The pool area is small but with 8 rooms it's never overcrowded. Rooms are spacious and nicely decorated. loads of really nice restaurant to choose from in the centre so just let the owners know what cuisine your after and they'll tell you the best place to go. We loved The Beach House.
 The beach is lovely and if you buy drinks and snacks from the bars they let you use the sun beds for free. All bars only stay open till 11pm then one bar each night is granted to stay open till late. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was because of the air con unit it was right above the bed and it had really bright lights on which made it hard to get to sleep at first, but in no way would it stop me goin back again. Wonderful stay at a wonderful place.
title: Nice break in a peaceful location

text: Good hotel with nice Italian staff. Room is clean and cool. Free beachtowels provided. Breakfast is good and a lot food. Unfortunately the pushbikes are only for the staffmembers and not for the guests. Swimmingpool is okay for its size..
title: Good hotel

text: This hotel is the best you can get on Gili T! The owner family is super friendly and made our stay perfect. The rooms are beautiful and clean, the pool area is nice and the breakfast is delicious. And they even have italian coffee! Thank you for the pleasant stay!
title: Excellent!!!

text: We've just had a week at the very lovely Marygio Resort. Owned and run by an Italian family who were very welcoming and friendly. The hotel is small with rooms set around a blue pool. It is scrupulously clean with the staff forever sweeping, dusting and wiping. It is a bit of an oasis as Trawangan doesn't have paved roads so there is a lot of dust. It's also away from the party area, about 20 minutes walk or 5 minutes via the pony and trap. The breakfasts were good and generous.
title: A good hideaway from the hustle and bustle of Gili T

text: My husband and I spent 4 nights at Marygio. The hotel is very clean and well maintained. The staff is friendly and kind. The Italian couple who run the place are nice and gave us good tips for restaurants in Gili T and also in Ubud. The only downside is the pillows (not soft at all).
title: Nice hotel

text:
A little bit outside of the central area of Gili Trawagan that can be a bit too noisy, this accommodation is a good choice even if a bit overpriced for the area.
Positive points: nice swimming pool and loungers, excellent staff service always with a smile, great breakfast filling you up for the morning. balcony in the room.
Negative points: Mattress too hard for my taste, muezzin in the proximity waking us up at sunrise, room itself a bit small
title: Nice place with great breakfast and good staff

text:
My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay at the Marygio Resort. The hotel is about a 2 minute walk from the main beach street and is towards the quieter, northern end of the island but still within a very easy walk of many bars and restaurants. We enjoyed walking away from the main beach road and seeing something of the island 'village'. Just remember to bring a torch or charge your mobile phone for returning after dark!

The resort itself is new, stylish and very lovely. The set-up is quite intimate, with a small number of rooms around a courtyard pool. A great deal of attention to detail has been paid by the hotel management, from the welcome drink, to the amenities in the room and the regular (twice daily!) cleaning. We only used the pool in the evening, but it was beautiful and always seemed quiet during the day. 

Breakfast was simple, but fresh, plentiful and delicious. Alessandra, the Italian owner, and her Indonesian team were incredibly friendly and helpful. 

The resort is quiet and intimate. Definitely not a party place, but perfect for those looking for a cozy retreat on Gili T. We hope to return in the not-too-distant future!
title: A perfect stay

text:
We’re staying in this resort at this moment and we’re getting more than we may have wished for. The apartments are very clean & bright, the food is great and the staff is very helpful, polite & correct.
The resort is situated abt 100 mtrs away from the boulevard which makes it a quiet place to stay and very close to these who wants to go to the boulevard.
Would definitely recommend this resort for people who are becoming happy from a clean, nice welcome place to stay

Matthijs & Mariette
title: Fabulous

text: Marygio, a small, beautiful place close to everything you need. The rooms were so nice. Spacious, comfortable and clean. It had a fridge and a big balcony. The staff, Especially Sahman were very helpful and friendly. Breakfast was delicious with home made bread and fresh juice. We would recomend everybody to stay here.
title: Comfortable and charming place with excellent service

text: definitely recommend staying at Marygio - close to the city centre, but far enough that you dont have any noise at night / first thing in the am. staff is super helpful and very nice, breakfast is also amazing! would def stay again
title: super located hotel close to all the action

text:
Stayed at the Marygio resort for 9 nights....only bad thing about it was leaving too soon....what a place....rooms were big and very clean,super clean bathrooms,never had a breakfast like this before,no buffet but cooked to order every morning served with a smile by Sahman.....cake of the day every morning too,fresh juice and fruits......
Rooms cleaned twice a day,didn't see one spider or cockroach during our stay.....
You get pool towels and sarongs to use for pool and beach.....we had bicycles for free to get us around the island 
Whenever we came back we were met with a big smile from al the people who worked there ....thought it was sweet when they said "mum and dad " are back because they all could have been our grandkids with the difference in age .....
All the staff were always busy cleaning,working around pool and garden,great work ethic....
Location is great,5 minutes walk to the beach,just a 10 minute walk from the harbour and one street inland,close enough to everything but a peaceful place to stay.....loved the pool for evening swims ,even in the rain.
Here is a big thank you to Sahman,Anan,Osman,Seri,Nur,Atik for spoiling us rotten,from cooking breakfast doing our washing,serving us with a smile,the nice chats we had....we all miss you and can't wait to come back one day.....great team of young people with their hearts in the right place,lots of love from nadine and Martin.xxx
title: Little paradise on gilli t

text: We stayed at Marygio resort between 2 June June ,although its down a little ally , we had a great welcome ,drinks on arrival , and the owners are very friendly too , we also received an amazing  piece of Italian cake on the day as well as at breakfast . The pool was great for evening swims, Was a bit difficult to commincate with staff as most of them dont speak english. But none the less , great stay .
title: Great place

text:
We had terrible trouble getting to the island and didn't make it to the hotel until 1.30 am in the morning when we arrived Alessandra told us to go straight to bed not to worry about any check in details and just go rest up after the awful time we had that's all we wanted to do. The next morning we went for breakfast and it was delicious and the staff were so friendly 2e then checked it. The hotel itself is lovely clean and tidy and the room are a nice size the location is great close enough to everything but still far enough not no kept away with the music all night. Yanti was also so helpful the staff here are truly some of the nicest staff I have ever come across in the hospitality industry. For that reason alone I would return here and the rest of the reasons are just a added bonus. We had to leave early as we had to get the awful slow ferry back and they were very understanding and helpful.
Highly recommend this hotel
title: Perfect

text: The weather condition was not acceptable to the coast guard,  they decided to stop all speedboat services to the Island from at least July 21 to 24.  My arrival date was July 21 and  of course I will not be able to go given the Coast Guard decision.  I called and email Marygio Resort via Booking.com.  Booking was very professional but not Marygo.  I received some nasty email from the hotel saying that I am “stupid” as other customers were able to come and go and I am the only 1... it goes on saying that I can take the small plane or ferries.  Speedboat from SCOOT will take me 4 hours,  the ferries ( it takes 2 ferries + drive across mountain as I was told) will take more than 9 hours if the weather is good.  Insulating remark + no refund.  What an unprofessional customer services.  Just say no without insulting your customer ....Avoid it!
title: Poor services

owner_response.text: I answer: I dare not say: stupid even to those close to me, I could never tell a stranger. You could also publish the email in which I write this. I understand that you are angry, but your reservation does not have the requisites to be canceled for free. The hotel was full, the only no-show, we had it for you. The island was easily accessible by ferry and plane, this is what all the other guests have done. This is not a good reason to denigrate the hotel you've only seen in photography
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Very nice stay at this hotel, friendly and helpful straff. Clean room, good breakfast! The only drawback was that there weren’t too many options and it could take a while before getting the breakfast when there were a fre others having breakfast as well. They lent us snorkeling gear for free and we saw a few turtles at the beach below the hotel.
title: Nice accomondation

text: Had a pleasant stay at the Marygio. The pool and rooms were clean, the hosts were polite. There was nothing, however, beyond average in my experience. The hotel is set inland, which helps you avoid noise, but results in a farther walk to all the areas of interest. There is not much else to comment on, was surprised at the disconnect between the traveler reviews and the actual experience there; nothing made this hotel particularly stand out. And the 10 AM checkout time is something I had never seen before.
title: Perfectly average stay at a perfectly average hotel

text: A little disappointed with the place after reading all the good reviews. The place was clean but that's about it, will not recommend it if you are looking for something a bit more. Breakfast has a lot of selection but nothing to shout about.  Staff was good but we didn't find them to be as friendly as other reviews have suggested. Maybe it was just our luck. Thought there were other hotels we might have chosen if we were to go back to Gili Tranwangan for another holiday.
title: Average

text: We stayed here for 3 nights and it was the Perfect base to explore the Gili Islands from, the owners are really attentive, the hotel is super clean, we were supplied with towels for the pool and also for the beach. The pool area is very clean and a lovely place to relax, we had the breakfast which was very fresh and tasty, such good value for money I would recommend this hotel highly 😊
title: Lovely little hotwl

text:
As the title says...perfect stay, couldn’t have asked for more!

Lovely clean place, well maintained and presented. Really chilled and calm atmosphere.

Great location for what we wanted. 2 minutes from the beach, about a 10 minutes stroll from the bars/clubs.

The staff were so welcoming, could not help enough and were so accommodating. Provided great recommendations on where to eat on the island.

Wouldn’t consider looking at another place to stay should we come back to Gili Trawangan.

Thanks for having us.
title: Perfect Stay!

text:
The hosts are the highlight of the place. The personal care which they take to make sure your stay is peaceful is definitely what sets this apart from other resorts in the area. They were very welcoming and even provided us with snorkeling kits, fins, and gave us precise instructions on where /when to snorkel during our stay. Their staff is also as welcoming, accommodating and always smiling.
Cycle can be rented at appx Rp 40000/24hours (i.e. appx 3-US$) from  a shop just opposite the resort. 
You always come back to a made up bed and a neat room - which is cleaned twice a day. The breakfast is outstanding. Everything is freshly prepared and delicious, with a number of choices. The place is about 3min walk from the most happening area of the beach and yet secluded from the hustle of it. WiFi is good, not great. The pool is very clean and about 1.4m deep throughout. Separate Towels are given to you for the shower, the pool and the beach. There is a locker for valuables in the cupboard and a small fridge too. Place for Renting kayaks, snorkel gear, bicycles, scuba-centres, tour operators for visit to the islanda are all within 5mins walk from this place. 
The charge for a horse cart from the ferry station to the resort is Rp.100000 each way (5mins ride).
This is not a sprawling huge resort, its rather a homely and cosy one. The Rooms and bathrooms are not very spacious but that did not matter much to us. We would like to stay here again if back in Gili.
title: All you need to know about the Marygio

text: We had a great time here.  Cleanest pool on the island and the owners are lovely!  We actually had to check out of our previous accomodation because it was too noisy, but here was perfect!  Great location too.  Just set back from the busy main street.  Nice brekky also!  Would recommend here.
title: Fantastic

text:
Myself and my boyfriend arrived to Marygio stressed from our journey after a series of unfortunate events on our trip. The staff were so warm and welcoming and really couldn’t do enough for us to try and help us. 

They recommended a medical centre nearby, gave us directions and even rang them to confirm that they would see us before we went. They also helped us sort out some problems we had with our bank - by letting us use their phone and by translating emails. 

The hotel itself is as described by other 5* reviews. The pool was quiet, the breakfast varied and delicious and the room was spotless. 

We were given pool towels, snorkels to borrow and sarongs for the beach. They really had thought of everything. 

Owners & staff if you’re reading this - thank you! You honestly single-handedly turned our disastrous holiday completely around.
title: Couldn’t have asked for more

text:
This hotel really was a great find. There are less than 10 rooms so it is very quiet, and has an almost private feel to it. The hotel itself has a lovely ambience and is styled in an old Italian / European way, with a lovely swimming pool and a sunbathing area it escape the hustle and bustle of Gili T. 

The real highlight are the Italian father and daughter owners who are very friendly and can't do enough for you. They were always chatty, knowledgeable about the islands with recommendations on things to do, places to go. They also helped with hiring bicycles and taxi's when we were leaving to move onto the next island. 

The breakfast was also a real highlight. They have a menu with 5-6 options, but everything is cooked fresh to order and you can have as many as you like. All their bread and cakes are made fresh on site and everything we tried was really tasty.

The location of the hotel is at the quiet end of the Island so there is no noise in the evenings, but you have a bit of a walk / horse taxi to the party area 

All in all this stay was a highlight of our trip and we would be happy to stay here next time we were are in Gili T
title: Fantastic, peaceful hotel with great owners!

text: Friendly, generous and with personality. Service minded staff and a charming hotel owner. Excellent breakfast and free snacks as surprise during the afternoon. A relaxed atmosphere that invited to conversations with other guests.
title: Very good hotel

text:
Had such a lovely stay at this hotel! Not only was the room and pool great but the hotel staff were amazing. So accommodating and kind. 

I must also say that their special cake they give you as you sit down for breakfast is DELICIOUS! I definitely recommended this place
title: Beautiful hotel

text:
Room:
We had a nice poolside room. The AC was good enough to keep us happy. The bathroom was not super, but it was nice for the gili standsrs.

Pool area:
The pool is very nice. Nice garden around it. Gets a bit hot, because the air doesn't really move around there. The sun beds are made for frontal tanning only, they don't go all flat. 

Food:
The breakfast was super nice, you could order the amount of food that you wanted. Every thing tasted very good. Be careful not to order too much! They will fill your table if you are greedy with the order. The hotel doesn't offer lunch or dinner, only breakfast. But theres a lot of nice restaurants close around (look for some in the inner island also).

Staff:
The staff where super helpful. We had a lot of problems with our boat tickets ad the staff where always trying to help us. The staff gave us everything we needed. 

Overall:
I had a good time here, I would definitely recommend this place! My only small minus came from the cigarette smell around the pool area... and it was not made by the customers...

Thank you! We had a great visit! I would come again :)
title: Super breakfast and nice pool

text: This resort is a little hidden gem. Location is one block off beach front away from the noise & crowds. Allesandra & Adriano the owners and their staff offer great hospitality and facilities. The location gives you great access to both sides of the island and all it has to offer. We initially booked for 1 night but loved it so much we kept extending our stay.
title: Great location and great hosts

owner_response.text: Thank you for choosing us. Alessandra
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Wonderful place !!! The staff is amazing amd the owner very careful and amazing ! 2 minutes of walking from the beach ! Very secure place ! Highly recommend !!! Nice and big room Beautiful site and pool. Very clean and well maintain. Service 5 stars !
title: vacation

text:
¡BEST PLACE IN GILI! No doubt! 

I was traveling with another friend. Two girls. 

- Marygio hotel is runned by an Italian family who took care of us as we would be part of the family. Same with their staff, they would advice as on every single thing about the island. Safe places, good restaurants, things to do in Gili and so on. We felt as we were home! Any small issue we came across they sorted it out for us! 
- Breakfast is amazing! I would wake up and thing about the amazing omelette they make, fresh juices & cakes were superb! So yummy! 
- Room will be spotlessly clean, they would do the room everytime you left so it would always be fresh and clean! 
- Security guy at night time would be there waiting for us to arrive and make sure we were ok. 
- They would offer sarongs for the beach and you could have them clean and fresh everyday. Same with snorkeling gear, they would give it to you for free! So you didn’t have to rent from other places at the beach! 
- The location is PERFECT! 2 minuts walk to the best spot in the beach and 15 min walk to sunset beach. Main road with all the bars and restaurants only 2 min walk! 
Although is very central, the hotel is so quiet! No noise, and a super relaxing atmosphere! 
- Bed and room so confortable!
There is no doubt that I would 100% recommend this hotel and will definitely return whenever I get the chance! 
Thank you to all for making our trip more amazing!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
title: BEST HOTEL IN GILI T!!!!!!!!!

text:
Don't really want to write this as I want to keep this little gem of a hotel to myself! 
From the minute we arrived the owner (Adrian) and his staff we extremely friendly, helpful and informative about the island.  They had free snorkel equipment that we could borrow and were super attentive to my needs when I returned with a nasty cut on my leg from the coral. 
The rooms are super with a fridge, water, kettle, TV and hot running water.  The beds are super comfy and the AC works a treat. 
Now the breakfast; AMAZING, all homemade bread and pastries, delicious. 
I would highly recommend and would love to return in the future.  The owner, his daughter and staff show genuine interest in you and are more than happy to help any way they can.  Five stars from me!!
title: Fabulously relaxing, excellent staff and service

text:
First of all my partner has already done a review about Marygio. 
However upon leaving the island and continuing our journey to KL I've discovered a lot of items missing from my suit case. 
Usually I don't do reviews, it's just not my thing, however after losing probably around £250 of clothes ( designer gear ) I've had no option but too. 
Primarily our first night staying in the property. we returned to the door being unlocked & slightly opened. Now I didn't query this due to there being so called security across the room over the pool.  First thought was, did I leave it unlocked, but the bed was made and the mosquito repellent was plugged back in. So someone's definitely been in the room and now I'm presuming it's happened then.
Obviously I've no proof but when you leave the property you expect at least to come back with the door locked and secure.
Additionally, you have to leave the key as you leave the property at the desk. Which may I add anyone can grab and use.  We just walked right in, collected our room key from the desk and walked to the room without anyone asking our names or knowing who we are. 
The whole Indonesia experience as been a disaster and this just tops it off. 

Absolutely fuming at the moment. if your thinking about staying at the property, don't be leaving any nice looking clothes in your suit case that's all I can say!
title: Unpleasant discovery

owner_response.text: This Review is defamatory and utterly false.The reviewer, however, has got our downgrade on the portal.The staff goes in and out the front door, no bags or containers of any kind.I wonder how he could take out of the hotel, DRESSES SIGNED?£ 250? We have decided to proceed, we resort to the legal office of TRIP ADVISOR
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The hotel was in a great location as it was close enough to the nightlife to walk (around 15 minute walk from the main bars near the harbour) but also far enough away that it didn't keep you up all night. The owner was really friendly and went out of her way to make sure we felt welcome and had everything we needed. One day we skipped breakfast but when we came out she offered us something to take with us for our journey back to the mainland which was lovely - she also helped us get a good price when renting bikes to ride around the island. Overall a really nice place to stay and would recommend whether you're coming as family, friends or a couple! :)
title: Great location and great staff!

text: We spent 3 nights at  Marygio, and we really recommend this place if you come to Gili T (which is the main question mark). We have been very much satisfied with the room, the pool and the breakfast. The management is also extraordinary, full of advices. It is walkable from everywhere and goes even faster by bike. I believe the price is slightly high. The other inconvenient, which is for the whole island and in general for indonesia, the "call for pray", fortunately the one at 4/5am lasts for less than 5 minutes.
title: Recommended on Gili T

text:
What a lovely hotel. It was one of the best in all our stay in Indonesia. We were welcomed like friends by the Italian couple who ownes this hotel. It is lovely decorated, around a nice swimming pool. Large rooms, very clean, with a big balcony. We would have prefered a blanket in the night, only sheets is not enough with the aircondition on. 
The breakfast was amazing ! The staff was lovely. Gili T is paradise.
title: Beautiful

text:
The resort is very pleasant with well maintained modern facilities and very friendly and efficient owners and staff.  We really enjoyed our one night stay.

However, there were a few issues.  The worst was the local roosters which crowed at intervals right through the night.  The mattress was very firm, and the AC, despite being very modern, was fairly noisy.  Checkout was also excessively early at 10 am.  There's also some poetic licence in the distances on their signs.  The one from the "main" street said 80 m when it's actually 180 m and the one at the cross roads said 10 m when there is still 50 m to go.
title: Close but not quite perfect

text: Enjoyed the stay at Marygio. The rooms and public areas are clean, and staff is very helpfull regarding transport or meal options. Official check is relatively early, but resort allows later check out if rooms is not rented out. The pool is small, but allows cooling down and proper lounging. The 'resort'/ B&B is located of the main strip, which is conveniently quiet, but nevertheless allows easy acces to the beach. The better restaurants (with fresh fish) are a 10 min walk away on the other side of the Island. Many dive operators are nearby.
title: Nice quiet place with geat breakfast

text: Stayed for two nights,decent sized rooms,friendly staff,but not on map upon arrival so had to get horse and cart to resort.if u are coming to gili for a party probably not best to come here good 20 minute walk to any decent bars through a couple of dark alleys.all rooms look out on each other so wouldn't suit people who don't enjoy being overlooked.would not stay again but wouldn't say it was terrible.
title: Party Poopers

text: When my boyfriend and I first arrived we were welcomed by an incredibly lovely italian woman, which was a wonderful surprise for us since my boyfriend is Italian and I'm Spanish which makes it so easy to communicate. We were led to our cozy room with view to the pool and reception. After 3 weeks of traveling in Bali and Lombok Marygio has been the cleanest accomodation we've been to. The breakfast selection in the morning (included with the room) is not big but very yummy. The serve homemade bread, the usual fruits, coffee, tea etc. Also if you're interested in good places for dinner or lunch the owner will be more than happy to help you! The italian way of living is reflected not only in the clean rooms but also in the loving way they have towards all the hotel guests. You feel like you're in a little family away from home! Bruschetta was served to all the guests (we were all enjoying the evening by the pool) as a surprise. My boyfriend and I felt extremly comfortable and save at Marygio! It is a nice stay to explore the little but yet so absolutely beautiful Gili Trawangan Island. Carolina & Denis
title: Home away from Home!

text:
I stayed here in January 2014 and can only echo a lot of the positive comments made by others.  This place has plenty going for it on an island where by its very nature you're not going to get total luxury in terms of your accommodation - good clean rooms, very nice breakfast, good pool area (which you can often have to yourself during low season), good location (being just off the main backpacker area but very close to beach)... but the main thing that makes this place are the owners, Alessandra and Adriano.  Alessandra was away for a lot of our stay so our main dealings were with Adriano - such a hospitable host, offering us a couple of free drinks as we sat by the pool on occasion and always so friendly and engaging with his demeanor.

Highly recommended.
title: Excellent family run hotel

text: Decided to go there after reading some of the reviews.... A real gem! The rooms are spotless and big, the bathrooms clean and well designed, and the swimming pool area perfect. Situated in a small back lane, away from the noise and main backpacking area, but still 2mn walk from the beach (where you can go snorkelling and see turtles without taking a boat tour!)  and nice restaurants. But what makes it special are the owners, Adriano and Alessandra, who will do anything to make you feel welcome, and the staff, all a joy to talk to. Breakfast is also really good, with pancakes, bread and cakes, fruits etc. We ended up staying longer than planned because we felt so much at home. The worse part was to have to leave!
title: Absolutely brilliant!

text:
Staff and owners are very friendly and helpful. Even owner borrowed me his rain cover for couple 
of days because I was unable to find one in shops - very nice touch that is hard to write anything 
negative :-). Rooms and bathroom are very clean
...still, I think breakfast is very ordinary if you are staying for more than 2-3 days. If owners are reading this -  please include some extra things in breakfast... :-)
title: Very Clean

text:
Stayed for 3 nights in December 2013 - rooms are nicely grouped around the swimming pool with very comfortalbe beds and nice modern bathrooms - cleaned more than once a day - owner family from Maestre / Venezia / Italy is lovely - really makes you feel welcome and cares for everything you ask for - staff is fantastic, as is the breakfast that comes with some nice italian goodies (like the bred and coffee) - location is nice and quiet - but bring a flashlight to walk home after hanging out on the main drag of Gili T. ;-)  Two things could be improved: The room has no fridge and the water preasure is not very high in the shower (however this could be an issue on the whole island as it develops way too quickly)

grazie a tuti!
title: belissimo!

text: I visited marygio hotel with My friend in september this year and we stayed for 9 nights. Everything was perfect! Clean rooms, good location, homely feeling due to the amazing staff and owners, great breakfast and food. Would definately stay here again!
title: Best hotel Ever!

text: Really enjoyed our 3 night stay at the Marygio, the owners and staff made us feel very welcome and did their up most to ensure we had an amazing stay.   The rooms were comfortable and spotless.  They were cleaned at least twice a day.  Breakfast was very very tasty.  Located in a quiet spot, we had no problems sleeping.  It was an easy stroll into the centre of Gili T.  The beach right next to the hotel is the best bit for relaxing on.  The snorkelling on this stretch of the beach is also amazing we saw turtles and some amazing fish - their was really no need to go diving....although we did!  I'd definitely stay here again.
title: Perfect stay amazing service

text:
Stayed 4 nights at the Marygio and was absolutely fantastic !! It is new (opened July 2013) stylish, and has a great pool area to just to chill around.The stand out is  service and hospitality from the Italian owners (who live on the premises) and their staff  it is amazing, they cannot do enough for you!! Simple although very tasty breakfast supplied daily.  Although it is not on the beach front it was well located up a lane way only 80 meters from the beach and the quiet end of the restaurant/bar strip. So it's an easy walk to any place for dinner or drink but a peaceful night sleep away from the live music and the mosque. Will definitely stay there again and let our friends and family know. 
Thanks for the enjoyable stay and the Gilli T fantastic holiday 
Michael and Kym, Mandurah Western Australia
title: New and Amazing Service

text: The rooms are basic but very clean and a modern bathroom. The hotel is new and the owners are very attentive, super friendly and helpful. Would recommend staying here. A bit off the main strip which is nice because it's quiet, but bring a flashlight for the walk/bike back at night.
title: Clean and quant

text: I never normally go to the effort of writing a review, but for this family I've made an exception. The staff were wonderful, they went out of their way to ensure our every need was met. The rooms were so clean, as was the rest of the grounds. Amazing pool too! Would definitely go back. Only negative for us as a young couple was the location, we'd have been better nearer the south of the island where more of the parties take place, but it didn't matter too much as we could just cycle or go by horse and cart which is both cheap and fun!  :)
title: Super friendly

text: After doing research for weeks to find a good but not expensive place for our 8 night stay I have come across with this hotel last minute. Perfect location-close to the beach and restaurants and few minutes walk to the harbour but not right on the busy beachfront. Size of the garden and pool is perfect, breakfast quality superb and the staff could not be more helpful. Rooms are clean (serviced 2x a day) and stylish.
title: Very stylish

text: Abbiamo avuto il piacere di soggiornare presso questa bella struttura per 2 settimane. Ci siamo trovati benissimo , tutto lo staff molto gentile ,preparato  e disponibile a soddisfare ogni nostra richiesta , anche al di fuori dei loro obblighi. Camere accoglienti e pulizia ottima .
